Package com.bomber7.utils

Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.utils.Config
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Config extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the user configuration settings such as global volume, music volume, and selected language.

This class is serializable and can be saved or loaded using standard Java serialization.

See Also:
